medical_history.chief_complaint: Left thyroid nodule discovered on MRI done for chronic neck pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The nodule was incidentally discovered on MRI performed for chronic neck pain. The patient reported no previous awareness of a neck mass and denied any difficulty swallowing, breathing, or changes in voice.
medical_history.family_history: Family history of 'thyroid disease'; no known family history of cancer.
